str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
A stumbling-block, an occasion for falling, a moral embarrassment. From proskopto; a stub, i.e. occasion of apostasy.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
A snare, stumbling-block, cause for error. Scandal; probably from a derivative of kampto; a trap-stick, i.e. Snare.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
